title: Carrand 40102 8.75" x 4.75" x 3" Giant Bone Sponge, Yellow
description: For 30 years Carrand has pioneered automotive cleaning with innovation, quality, and value to help customers maintain their vehicles "showroom new" appearance inside and out. Carrand’s bone sponge is extra absorbent and durable. The extra-large bone-shaped sponge is easy to hold.
